mapper.insert: insert into free_board_reply (reply_idx, all_reply_number, content, member_idx, board_idx, member_nickname) values(free_board_reply_seq.nextval, all_board_reply_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{member_idx}, #{board_idx}, #{member_nickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from free_board_reply where board_idx = #{board_idx} order by reply_idx desc
select * from free_board_reply where board_idx = #{board_idx} order by reply_idx desc
mapper.update: update free_board set reply_count = ( select count(*) from free_board_reply where free_board_reply.board_idx = free_board.board_idx) where board_idx = #{board_idx}
update free_board_reply set content = #{content} where reply_idx = #{reply_idx}
